title: Narekavank
description: Narekavank, or Narek Monastery, was a tenth-century Armenian monastery near the southern shore of Lake Van. It was a major monastic center, and the mystical poet Grigor Narekatsi (951-1003) studied and resided there. The monastery was abandoned and demolished in the 20th century.

properties.description: Point representing the mid-20th century mosque constructed on the site of the former Narek Monastery.
properties.title: OSM location of mosque at Yemi≈ülik
